response.name: HTML
response.desc: HTML holds the web together! Knowing basic HTML will get you up and running.

response.name: CSS
response.desc: CSS makes your HTML look good! We're using the Bootstrap library here and we suggest using a library unless you are already awesome at CSS.

response.name: JavaScript
response.detail: a powerful language to process your HTML
response.desc: JavaScript gives life to your HTML! If you know JavaScript, that's great! But you don't need to know it at all to use HTMW, we're using jQuery for fun.

response.name: JSON
response.desc: JSON provides data to your HTML! If you are comfortable with JSON you can write and consume your own data. You can also use no-code endpoints for your data.

response.name: No-code Endpoints
response.desc: No-code provides backend functionality to your HTML! Using API/No-code endpoints you can integrate any type of data you need. Endpoints provide login functionality, data manipulation, data read/write etc., for any project you can imagine. For more information see our partner no-code company at zzzap.io for your data.
